Classification component-wise boosting learner

mlr_learners_classif.compboost.Rd

A LearnerClassif for a component-wise boosting model implemented in Compboost in package compboost.

Initial parameter values

  • Parameter xval is initialized to 0 in order to save some computation time.

Super classes

mlr3::Learner -> mlr3::LearnerClassif -> LearnerClassifCompboost

Methods

  • LearnerClassifCompboost$new()

Method new()

Creates a new instance of this R6 class.

Usage

LearnerClassifCompboost$new()

Method importance()

The importance scores are extracted from the model slot $calculateFEatureImportance().

Usage

LearnerClassifCompboost$importance()

Returns

Named numeric().

Method selected_features()

Selected features are extracted from the model slot $getSelectedBaselearner().

Usage

LearnerClassifCompboost$selected_features()

Returns

character().

Save the model to a JSON file.

(character(1)
Name/path to the file.

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.
